channel.title: Guide on Wise Lab Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on Wise Lab Wiki

item.title: 1. Building basic models
item.description: This guide will take you through the process of building trial-by-trial learning models. It assumes some knowledge of how these models work, and is more focused on the implementation.

item.title: 2. Modelling multiple participants
item.description: In the previous section, we discussed how to model a single participant. In this section, we will discuss how to model multiple participants.

item.title: 3. MCMC sampling
item.description: The previous sections outline how to generate simulated data using a computational model. In this section, we will discuss how to use Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampling to fit a model to data.
